about.description:
Brings functional programming to Python land by providing a bunch of
primitives to write declarative business logic. Also enforces better
architecture with fully typed with annotations and checked with mypy.
This package is PEP561 compatible and adds emulated Higher Kinded Types
support. It also provides type-safe interfaces to create your own data-types
with enforced laws, and has a bunch of helpers for better composition.
about.summary: Make your functions return something meaningful, typed, and safe!

about.description:
Brings functional programming to Python land by providing a bunch of
primitives to write declarative business logic. Also enforces better
architecture with fully typed with annotations and checked with mypy.
This package is PEP561 compatible and adds emulated Higher Kinded Types
support. It also provides type-safe interfaces to create your own data-types
with enforced laws, and has a bunch of helpers for better composition.
about.summary: Make your functions return something meaningful, typed, and safe!

name: returns
raw_meta_yaml:
schema_version: 1

context:
  name: returns
  version: 0.26.0
  python_min: 3.10

package:
  name: ${{ name|lower }}
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/${{ name[0] }}/${{ name }}/returns-${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 180320e0f6e9ea9845330ccfc020f542330f05b7250941d9b9b7c00203fcc3da

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: ${{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - poetry-core >=2
    - python ${{ python_min }}.*
  run:
    - python >=${{ python_min }}
    - typing_extensions >=4.0,<5.0

tests:
  - python:
      imports:
        - returns
      pip_check: true
      python_version: ${{ python_min }}.*

about:
  summary: Make your functions return something meaningful, typed, and safe!
  license: BSD-2-Clause
  license_file: LICENSE
  description: |
    Brings functional programming to Python land by providing a bunch of
    primitives to write declarative business logic. Also enforces better
    architecture with fully typed with annotations and checked with mypy.
    This package is PEP561 compatible and adds emulated Higher Kinded Types
    support. It also provides type-safe interfaces to create your own data-types
    with enforced laws, and has a bunch of helpers for better composition.


  homepage: https://github.com/dry-python/returns
  documentation: https://returns.readthedocs.io

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - thewchan
